forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon showcases a tapestry of mostly sunny skies, the soft sunlight breaking through to paint the city in warm hues. At this moment, with breezes flowing at around 23 mph, you might feel a refreshing touch as the west-southwest wind sweeps across the streets. In the distance, there may be hints of the familiar marine layer, though it seems retreating—a promise of clearer vistas ahead. The temperature dances around the mid-60s, a pleasant kind of warmth, but those familiar with the city's microclimates know to keep a light layer close at hand for later when the evening coolness will creep in, dropping towards a cozy 53 degrees.

Tonight, the skies will remain mostly clear, allowing for a serene backdrop to the city's lights as they flicker in the dusk. The winds will settle slightly, still carrying a gentle breath from the west-southwest, perfect for an evening stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet visit to one of the many charming cafés that dot the area. As the day unwinds, consider donning a light jacket, perfect for this time of year, and explore the vibrant streets beneath the twinkling stars, perhaps with a warm beverage in hand.
